doc.name: fontStyles
doc.summary: Returns a list of styles available for a font and size.

description.overview: Use the fontStyles function to determine which font styles can be displayed or printed.

parameter.name: fontName
parameter.description: The name of a font that is installed on the system.

parameter.name: fontSize
parameter.description: A point size that exists for the font.

description.value: The fontStyles function returns a list of available styles, one per line.
description.comments:
If you specify a fontSize of zero, the styles returned are the ones that are scalable for the specified font.
The font styles are returned in a return delimited list, such as the following one:
plain
bold
italic
bold-italic
